rooms.description: A spacious entry with elegant Art Deco finishes and wide doorways for wheelchair accessibility. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning entrance in the auspicious direction.
Expansive living area with high ceilings, decorative moldings, and integrated seating areas that follow Art Deco aesthetics while providing a seamless flow for wheelchair movement.
An elegant dining space adjoining the kitchen, featuring a curved marble countertop and ample space ensuring accessibility. Placed optimally as per Vastu to encourage positive energy flow.
A fully equipped luxury kitchen with modern appliances, efficient layout, and wide passageways for wheelchair access. Designed to enhance both functionality and aesthetic appeal.
Opulent master bedroom with integrated en-suite bathroom, Art Deco detailing, and accessible design features ensuring easy mobility throughout the space.
Luxury guest bedroom designed for comfort and style, incorporating Vastu alignments to promote peace and relaxation.
Additional guest room with elegant decor inspired by Art Deco style, ensuring privacy while following local building norms.
A dedicated home office space designed for luxury and functionality. Equipped with ergonomic furniture and accessible layout, placed in a serene corner as per Vastu to enhance productivity.
Multi-functional room that can serve as a play area or utility room, incorporating design elements that resonate with the overall Art Deco theme.

openings.description: Widely accessible entrance door with automatic mechanism for ease of use by wheelchair users. Placed in the auspicious north-east direction according to Vastu.
Large, strategically placed windows to ensure ample natural light and ventilation, designed in line with Art Deco aesthetics.
A grand staircase integrated within the design for easy access between floors. The landing area is spacious, meeting accessibility requirements.
Expansive hallways that accommodate wheelchair movement and provide smooth transitions between rooms.
